name: MOTH KOTH
description:
You know how Moths punch each other and bounce around on pink stuff? Well gather some friends and get ready to live the dream. Games go quick, so hold on.

Supports 8 players! (players 2-8 must connect a USB controller to play)

P1 controls:

arrow keys: movement

N: punch

M: go back

P2 controls:

ESDF : movement

W: punch

Q: go back

Also download the standalone if you want to play it on the train or something.

This is the 3rd game in the '12 games in 12 months' project I'm doing while working full time.

Enjoy!
